body: `inputs` are borrowed. Anything in `outputs` should be +1. This stuff needs to change anyway to enable handing off ownship of tensors to subgraphs so I am not too worried about this code lasting a long time. I am trying to figure out to re-work the interpreter to enable this and hopefully make the list_of_retainables more straightforward.
